table.name: vtiger_cbsomaster
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_cbsomaster` ( `cbsomasterid` INT(11) NOT NULL, `cbsomasterno` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, `subject` VARCHAR(30) DEFAULT NULL, `salesorder_no` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, `purchase_order` VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT NULL, `duedate` DATE DEFAULT NULL, `pending` VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT NULL, `salescommission` DECIMAL(11) DEFAULT NULL, `account_id` INT(40) DEFAULT NULL, `invoiced` VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT NULL, `bill_street` VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT NULL, `bill_city` VARCHAR(30) DEFAULT NULL, `bill_state` VARCHAR(30) DEFAULT NULL, `bill_code` VARCHAR(30) DEFAULT NULL, `bill_country` VARCHAR(30) DEFAULT NULL, `bill_country` VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT NULL, `customerno` VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT NULL, `quote_id` INT(40) DEFAULT NULL, `contact_id` INT(40) DEFAULT NULL, `transporter` VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT NULL, `som_status` VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT NULL, `exciseduty` VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT NULL, `product` INT(40) DEFAULT NULL, `vat_value` DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT NULL, `ship_street` VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT NULL, `ship_city` VARCHAR(30) DEFAULT NULL, `ship_state` VARCHAR(30) DEFAULT NULL, `ship_code` VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT NULL, `ship_country` VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cbsomasterid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_cbsomastercf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_cbsomastercf` ( `cbsomasterid` INT(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cbsomasterid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
